name: solid-tiddlywiki-syncadaptor
description: Another attempt to make tiddlywiki a frontend for SoLiD Server.

scripts.start: rimraf ./demo-wiki && tiddlywiki demo-wiki --init server && mkdir ./demo-wiki/plugins && mkdir ./demo-wiki/tiddlers && cp -r ./src ./demo-wiki/plugins/solid-tiddlywiki-syncadaptor && node ./scripts/addToPluginList.js && node ./scripts/createDefaultTiddlers.js && tiddlywiki demo-wiki --listen

author: linonetwo
